mapper.select: SELECT a.i_user, a.i_host, a.room_title, DATE_FORMAT(a.r_dt, '%y-%m-%d %H:%i') as r_dt, b.pic_nm, a.ADDR FROM host_user a INNER JOIN thum_pic b ON a.i_host = b.i_host WHERE addr LIKE '%${addr}%'
SELECT i_user, addr, r_vastion, b_room, bed_qty, bth_room, room_title, acc, acc_bank, acc_owner, r_dt FROM host_user WHERE i_host = #{i_host}
